Html:
How can I identify type of object from a variable declared as NetOffice.AccessApi.Form?
For example for Microsoft.Office.Interop.Access.From I can use TypeName.
If TypeName(frm) = "Form_ObjectName" then Form, if TypeName(frm) = "T_ObjectName" then Table, if TypeName(frm) = "ObjectName" (or "_ObjectName") then Query.
Only by using UnderlyingObject?

Thanks!

Hello Serge,

Each instance from NetOffice has the property string UnderlyingTypeName{get;}
You may didnt see that because its marked with the [EditorBrowsable(EditorBrowsableState.Never) attribute
to avoid confusing developers.

Moreover you have:

string UnderlyingComponentName{get;}

string FriendlyTypeName{get;}

*Sebastian

Hello Sebastian,

thank you for your quick reply.

Regards,
Serge
